name: MoonDice
description:
[GMTK2020 - Roll of the Dice]

MoonDice is a top down shooter with a slight puzzle twist.  While most games of the genre will have you running and gunning in a bullet hell landscape, MoonDice forces you to think about your moves.  Remember - the bullet only connects if the numbers displayed are correct. This game will have you frantically rolling and controlling your dice to the right orientation as you advance towards the end goal.

Known bug(s): 

Certain tiles contain invisible walls impassable by neither player nor enemy but allows bullets through
